readLP.L2: o toki e ni kepeken uta kalama sina:

readTranslit.L2: o ante e ni tawa toki Inli:

hear.L2:
o kute. o ante e nimi kute
tan toki pona tawa toki Inli:

transcribe.L1: write what you hear in 'sitelen pona':
transcribe.L2: o sitelen kepeken siteilen pona e ni: toki kute sina.

write.L2: o sitelen e ni kepeken sitelen pona:

readSign.L1: say aloud the toki pona being signed:
readSign.L2: o toki e toki pona luka ni kepeken uta kalama sina:

makeSign.L1: sign out the sitelen pona below:
makeSign.L2: o toki lon toki pona luka e nimi anpa:

mnemonic.L1: say aloud the word attached to the mnemonic below:
mnemonic.L2: o toki lon toki pona e nimi pi sitelen anpa:
